general.description: With the power of our product teams, experience in workculture and network we take your digital business idea to the next level.

title: IT Power
for
Impact
Startups
top.subtitle:
We invest in your product for a better tomorrow.
For people, planet and progress!

offering.title: Get the Twip Boost
offering.subtitle:
We complement your software team
to overcome your product's tech barriers.

startup.title:
Overcoming
Tech Barriers
startup.textOLDtbd:
Let's be honest: You promised your investor a little bit more than your it team is capable of?
No worries, we're there for you. We support you in transforming your early prototype into scalable software, taking the right architectural decisions and keeping your technical debts under control.
startup.text: Developing new ideas involves many risks. We want to eliminate at least one variable in this game. With our Twip investment we mitigate the tech risk and accelerate your product development. We increase software quality, have the know how of over 1000 experts in all fields of technology and ensure knowledge transfer and team building in your venture.

useCases.title: Speed
useCases.text: Transfering your prototype into scaleable software in no time

useCases.title: Quality
useCases.text: Evaluating and reworking your current software architecture

useCases.title: Team
useCases.text: Strengthen your software team with temporary technical experts

investment.title: Share the Risk
investment.subtitle: Not a VC nor a business angel. As an IT investor we provide you with dedicated capital assigned to support your software development.

impact.title: Tech for Positive Impact
impact.text: With our engagement, we want to influence people and planet in a positiv and purposeful way: An intact ecological, social and economic structure should be preserved. If you share this vision as a founder, join us on our journey!

team.title: The Faces behind Twip
team.subtitle: Our core team has experience in the areas of entrepreneurship, software development and digital design. Feel free connecting to us!

partners.title: Network & Partners
partners.subtitle: It is important to us to provide the necessary support at any point in time. Our network complements our team with additional skills and expertise.

experience.title: Powered by more than 1000 Software Experts
experience.subtitle: Twip is a joint effort of MaibornWolff and QAware. You benefit from our project experience with numerous corporate and startup customers.

qaware.text: Shaping the digital future with high quality software engineering.

maibornwolff.text: Consulting, Coding and Testing in critical digitalisation projects.

contact.title: Get in touch
text: We're happy to get to know you!
